physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features three people
 with two of them being adults and the last one a child. All three of them are not standing up and both the adults are eating. The child is talking and gesturing to one of the adults. In front of them
 there is a pot of soup
 as well as a wood basket of gingers and other foods. The background of the photograph shows a number of barrels and a wood basket. A man
 whose head is not in the frame of the photograph
 can be seen at the left hand side.

metadata.title_text: Street Vendors (at dinner) Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features three people, with two of them being adults and the last one a child. All three of them are not standing up and both the adults are eating. The child is talking and gesturing to one of the adults. In front of them, there is a pot of soup, as well as a wood basket of gingers and other foods. The background of the photograph shows a number of barrels and a wood basket. A man, whose head is not in the frame of the photograph, can be seen at the left hand side.
